00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.IO;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00036     public class UserPanel : Gtk.VBox {
00037         // ============================================
00038         // PROTECTED Members
00039         // ============================================
00040         protected Gtk.Button folderButton;
00041         protected Gtk.Label labelDownload;
00042         protected Gtk.Label labelUpload;
00043         protected Gtk.Label labelTFiles;
00044         protected Gtk.Image imageFolder;
00045 
00046         // ============================================
00047         // PRIVATE Members
00048         // ============================================
00049         private Gtk.Label labelFolderButton;
00050         private bool timeoutUpdateRet;
00051         internal uint timeoutUpdate;
00052         private UserInfo myInfo;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC Constructors
00056         // ============================================
00057         public UserPanel() : base(false, 2) {
00058             // Get My Info
00059             this.myInfo = MyInfo.GetInstance();
00060 
00061             // Initialize Folder Image
00062             this.imageFolder = new Gtk.Image();
00063             this.PackStart(this.imageFolder, false, false, 2);
00064             SetOnlineStatusIcon(false);
00065 
00066             // Initialize Label Folder Button
00067             this.labelFolderButton = new Gtk.Label(GetNameLabel());
00068             this.labelFolderButton.Justify = Justification.Center;
00069             this.labelFolderButton.UseMarkup = true;
00070 
00071             // Initialize Folder Button
00072             this.folderButton = new Gtk.Button(this.labelFolderButton);
00073             this.folderButton.Relief = Gtk.ReliefStyle.None;
00074             this.PackStart(this.folderButton, false, false, 2);
00075 
00076             // Vertical Separator
00077             this.PackStart(new HSeparator(), false, false, 2);
00078 
00079             // Initialize Num Download Label
00080             this.labelDownload = new Gtk.Label("0 Download");
00081             this.PackStart(this.labelDownload, false, false, 2);
00082 
00083             // Initialize Num Upload Label
00084             this.labelUpload = new Gtk.Label("0 Upload");
00085             this.PackStart(this.labelUpload, false, false, 2);
00086 
00087             // Initialize Num Files Label
00088             this.labelTFiles = new Gtk.Label("0 Shared Files");
00089             this.UpdateSharedFilesNum();
00090             this.PackStart(this.labelTFiles, false, false, 2);  
00091 
00092             // Update Labels Timeout
00093             timeoutUpdateRet = true;
00094             timeoutUpdate = GLib.Timeout.Add(10000, UpdateInfoLabels);
00095 
00096             // Update Download Label
00097             DownloadManager.Added += new BlankEventHandler(UpdateDownloadNum);
00098             DownloadManager.Finished += new BlankEventHandler(UpdateDownloadNum);
00099             DownloadManager.Aborted += new BlankEventHandler(UpdateDownloadNum);
00100 
00101             // Update Upload Label
00102             UploadManager.Added += new BlankEventHandler(UpdateUploadNum);
00103             UploadManager.Finished += new BlankEventHandler(UpdateUploadNum);
00104             UploadManager.Aborted += new BlankEventHandler(UpdateUploadNum);
00105         }
00106 
00107         ~UserPanel() {
00108             timeoutUpdateRet = false;
00109 
00110             // Update Download Label
00111             DownloadManager.Added -= new BlankEventHandler(UpdateDownloadNum);
00112             DownloadManager.Finished -= new BlankEventHandler(UpdateDownloadNum);
00113 
00114             // Update Upload Label
00115             UploadManager.Added -= new BlankEventHandler(UpdateUploadNum);
00116             UploadManager.Finished -= new BlankEventHandler(UpdateUploadNum);
00117         }
00118 
00119         // ============================================
00120         // PUBLIC Methods
00121         // ============================================
00123         public void SetOnlineStatusIcon (bool online) {
00124             bool secure = myInfo.SecureAuthentication;
00125             FolderImage = StockIcons.GetPixbuf("MyFolder" + 
00126                                                ((online) ? "Online" : "Offline") +
00127                                                ((secure) ? "" : "Insecure"));
00128         }
00129 
00131         public void UpdateSharedFilesNum() {
00132             try {
00133                 UserInfo userInfo = MyInfo.GetInstance();
00134                 string sharedFolder = Paths.UserSharedDirectory(userInfo.Name);
00135                 int numFiles = CountDirectoryFiles(sharedFolder);
00136                 this.labelTFiles.Text = numFiles.ToString() + " Shared Files";
00137             } catch {}
00138         }
00139 
00141         public void UpdateDownloadNum (object sender) {
00142             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00143                 try {
00144                     int numDownload = DownloadManager.NDownloads;
00145                     this.labelDownload.Text = numDownload.ToString() + " Download";
00146                 } catch {}
00147             });
00148         }
00149 
00151         public void UpdateUploadNum (object sender) {
00152             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00153                 try {
00154                     int numUpload = UploadManager.NUploads;
00155                     this.labelUpload.Text = numUpload.ToString() + " Upload";
00156                 } catch {}
00157             });
00158         }
00159 
00160         // ============================================
00161         // PROTECTED (Methods) Event Handlers
00162         // ============================================
00163         protected bool UpdateInfoLabels() {
00164             if (timeoutUpdateRet) Application.Invoke(delegate { UpdateSharedFilesNum(); });
00165             return(this.timeoutUpdateRet);
00166         }
00167 
00168         // ============================================
00169         // PRIVATE Methods
00170         // ============================================
00171         private int CountDirectoryFiles (string path) {
00172             if (Directory.Exists(path) == false)
00173                 return(0);
00174 
00175             DirectoryInfo dirInfo = new DirectoryInfo(path);
00176             int numFiles = dirInfo.GetFiles().Length;
00177 
00178             foreach (DirectoryInfo subDir in dirInfo.GetDirectories())
00179                 numFiles += CountDirectoryFiles(subDir.FullName);
00180             return(numFiles);
00181         }
00182 
00183         private string GetNameLabel() {
00184             string name = this.myInfo.GetName();
00185             int length = name.Length;
00186 
00187             string label;
00188             if (length < 14) {
00189                 label = "<span size='x-large'><b>" + name + "</b></span>";
00190             } else if (length < 17) {
00191                 label = "<span size='large'><b>" + name + "</b></span>";
00192             } else if (length < 19) {
00193                 label = "<b>" + name + "</b>";
00194             } else {
00195                 string pt1 = name.Substring(0, 8);
00196                 string pt2 = name.Substring(length - 8);
00197                 label = "<b>" + pt1 + "..." + pt2 + "</b>";
00198             }
00199 
00200             string domain = this.myInfo.GetDomain();
00201             if (domain == null) return(label);
00202 
00203             length = domain.Length;
00204             if (length < 20) {
00205                 label += "\n" + domain;
00206             } else {
00207                 string pt1 = domain.Substring(0, 9);
00208                 string pt2 = domain.Substring(length - 8);
00209                 label += "\n" + pt1 + "..." + pt2;
00210             }
00211 
00212             return(label);
00213         }
00214 
00215         // ============================================
00216         // PUBLIC Properties
00217         // ============================================
00219         public Gdk.Pixbuf FolderImage {
00220             get { return(this.imageFolder.Pixbuf); }
00221             set { this.imageFolder.Pixbuf = value; }
00222         }
00223 
00225         public Gtk.Button FolderButton {
00226             get { return(this.folderButton); }
00227         }
00228     }
00229 }
